text:
Biotruth Naturophatic Clinic
Our goal is to provide everyone with the correct tools to achieve a healthy lifestyle through Naturopathy. Focusing on the root of the problem in order to heal from the inside to the outside in a holistic way. Our evaluation methods help us effectively guiding the person to reach the desired balance. We will determine the therapeutic methods in an individualized way since each human being is different and deserves to be treated as a unique human being.
Biotruth's concept was born with the purpose of regenerating health. Restore it in a natural way, food being the best way to do it. This is why we use the seed as an element.
The seed is reborn and regenerates in a natural way, that is Biotruth!
Why Naturopathy?
-
First, do no harm. Use less invasive and toxic therapies, use natural therapies.
-
The healing power of nature. Inherence of the body to heal itself.
-
Identify and treat the causes, (not just the symptoms) with natural therapies.
-
The Naturopath should guide the one who enjoys health and the sick person equally.
-
Treat the whole person, all physical, mental, spiritual, social, cultural dimensions.
-
Prevent, eat healthy, exercise, proper environment, healthy environment, spiritual development, positive thoughts.
Biography
Nishia Katori Ramos is a Puerto Rican licensed naturopath. She has a bachelor's degree in psychology from the Interamerican University of Puerto Rico, obtained her graduate nurse degree from the University of the Sacred Heart and studied medicine at the Universidad Central del Este in the Dominican Republic. She was always dedicated to her physical and mental health, so she has been taking care of what she eats for many years, introducing herself to vegetarianism and veganism, along with her commitment and dedication to helping others, complement her education by studying Naturopathy at EDP University. She has certifications in Kinesiology “Touch for Health (I, II, III, IV, Goal Setting and Metaphor and Kinesiology for Children and Teenagers) by the IKC, Kinesiology Tape (3 modules) by ZER, Adamantine System (Level 1, 2 and 3), Iridology and Advanced Kinesiology with neurological hammer. Nishia carried out her practice under the tutelage of Dr. Norman O. González and has participated in advanced kinesiology workshops with Dr. Iván Martínez, son of the Father of Naturopathy in Puerto Rico. Nishia participate many times as a volunteer by offering naturopathic consultations to low-income people with different groups around Puerto Rico.
